  "description": "Olam PFB manufactures and markets a range of branded packaged food products to consumers across multiple African markets. Over the last decade, the PFB business has established regional brand and market leadership positions in multiple consumer categories across targeted markets in West Africa. Packaged Foods Business portfolio currently counts eight key brands that are marketed to more than ten South and West African markets. Our R&amp;D teams, working closely with marketing, have helped us surprise and delight our consumers through differentiated and innovative products. The consumer categories we are present in West Africa include Tomato Paste, Instant Noodles, Instant Beverages, Biscuits, Confectioneries, Edible Oil, Pasta, and Dairy.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Plant Quality and Food Safety Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Quality &amp; Food Safety Manager to drive our commitment to consistent product quality, food safety, and operational excellence.
	This role is critical in leading the development, implementation, and continuous improvement of quality systems across the manufacturing value chain.
	The ideal candidate will be quality-driven, process-oriented, and able to collaborate across departments to foster a culture of zero defects and compliance with food safety standards.


Key Responsibilities
Business Process Improvement:


	Develop, implement, and continuously improve quality systems aligned with GFSI/FSSC 22000 standards.
	Ensure compliance with food safety requirements, including PRPs, GMP, and audit readiness.
	Lead root cause analysis (RCA) and corrective/preventive actions (CCA) for all quality deviations.
	Maintain and improve all key food safety programs (traceability, pest control, mock recall, etc.).
	Manage in-house lab testing for raw materials, in-process, and finished goods.
	Collaborate cross-functionally with R&amp;D, Manufacturing, and Sourcing on process improvement.
	Coordinate with external labs and calibration agencies for testing and compliance.


Risk Management:


	Monitor and report quality and food safety risks with appropriate escalation.
	Liaise with government and regulatory bodies for compliance and inspections.
	Track and present quality KPIs and compliance metrics on a regular basis.
	Ensure documentation and information flow for audits, reviews, and performance tracking.


Customer and Consumer Issue Management:


	Address consumer complaints with structured RCA and timely resolutions.
	Implement short-term and long-term solutions for recurring product quality issues.
	Identify and mitigate potential product issues proactively across the production line.


New Projects and Cost Efficiency:


	Support commissioning and start-up of new equipment and projects.
	Validate quality during trials, including travel and scale-up tests.
	Contribute to cost-efficient quality improvements without compromising standards.


Talent Management and Training:


	Train and develop QA and production staff on best practices, hygiene, and compliance.
	Conduct regular plant-wide training on food safety, GMP, and quality protocols.
	Identify learning needs and coach team members for continuous capability development.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Food Science, Microbiology, Industrial Chemistry, or related field.
	8&ndash;12 years of experience in Quality Assurance within the FMCG/food manufacturing sector.
	An advanced degree or certifications in Quality Management or Food Safety is a plus.


Key Skills &amp; Competencies:


	Strong understanding of Quality &amp; Food Safety Standards
	Proven experience developing quality manuals, procedures, and KPIs.
	Excellent communication and stakeholder management.
	Proficient in Root Cause Analysis (RCA), Corrective &amp; Preventive Actions (CAPA).
	Strong analytical and data interpretation skills.
	Proficiency in MS Excel, PowerPoint, and quality documentation.
	Regulatory knowledge (NAFDAC, SON, etc.) is an added advantage.
	Assertiveness and attention to detail in enforcing compliance.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;vacancy@olamnet.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

	Support commissioning and start-up of new equipment and projects.

	Contribute to cost-efficient quality improvements without compromising standards.

	Train and develop QA and production staff on best practices, hygiene, and compliance.

Experienced HR Officer Job at Farifaiz Investment Limited

The company has a Real Estate Firm, professional services and Logistics etc. The company is a parents company of The Kursi Limited.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Experienced HR Officer

Job Location: Lekki - Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are reseeking to employ an Experienced HR Officer to oversee the HR Dept of the organization.


Qualifications
     

            
    




	Interested candidates should possess an HND, NCE or OND qualification with 3-5 years of experience.
	Female is preferred
	She must leave in these environs; such, Lekki Ajah, Abraham Adesanya Sangotedo, Ogombo and Abidjan.


Salary
N100,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: careers@farifaiz.com using the Job PPosition as the subject of the email.

Note: Please note Female is preferred for this role.

Video Content Creator Job at Carbon Nigeria




        
    

        
        Carbon is a pan-African digital bank with a mission to provide friction-free finance to its customers. Carbon promises to play a fundamental role in its customers’ lives wherever they are, with flexible solutions. We pride ourselves on our efficiency and with just $10mm of equity raised in 2015, we have disbursed over $100m in loans and earned more than $30mm in revenue over the last 2 years. Carbon has operations in Ghana, Kenya, and Nigeria, supported by a talented team spread between Lagos, Nairobi, London, Argentina, and Palo Alto so we operate with a remote-first mindset. 

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Video Content Creator

Job Locatio: Lagos
     

            
    



About The Role


	We’re looking for a sharp, resourceful, and self-driven Video Content Creator to join our growing marketing team.
	You’ll be responsible for bringing the Carbon brand to life through high-quality video content for digital and social platforms.
	This is an executional role—focused on end-to-end video production, from filming and editing to graphics and final delivery.
	While your main responsibility is production, the ability to contribute to ideation or concept development is a welcome bonus.


What You’ll Do


	Bring ideas to life on screen: Produce and deliver engaging, high-quality video content for social media, digital campaigns, product explainers, and brand storytelling
	Own the full production process: Set up, shoot, edit, colour grade, and sound mix videos—solo or in collaboration with internal teams
	Create motion graphics and visual treatments that elevate our brand content
	Adapt static visuals and scripts into dynamic video formats that align with Carbon’s tone and goals
	Use AI tools to accelerate and enhance video production, from editing and voiceovers to animation and ideation support
	Ensure consistency with brand look and feel, even when working on diverse types of content
	Manage multiple timelines and deliverables, working efficiently and independently within a fast-paced environment


What We’re Looking For


	A strong portfolio of video work (especially digital-first content) that shows both craft and creativity
	Proficiency in video editing software (Premiere Pro, Final Cut, DaVinci Resolve) and motion graphics tools (After Effects, etc.)
	Hands-on experience shooting with DSLRs or mirrorless cameras, including setting up lighting and sound
	Ability to design or adapt motion graphics and animated elements
	Familiarity with AI tools (e.g. Runway, Pika, Descript, ElevenLabs, Midjourney) to support editing, enhancement, and ideation
	Detail-oriented, with a sharp visual sense and clean editing style
	Collaborative and open to feedback, with strong time management skills
	Bonus: Experience in animation or 3D design
	Bonus: Comfort contributing to creative ideation or storyboarding, even if it’s not your core skill.


Note
Please send us:


	A short note telling us why this role is a fit
	A link to your portfolio or showreel (required)
	Any relevant links to work you’re proud of.
